body:
Hello @TomAugspurger! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/sparse.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/90100451d4e00650bfdbf09c832c7f3f66d2626f/pandas/core/arrays/sparse.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/indexes/accessors.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/90100451d4e00650bfdbf09c832c7f3f66d2626f/pandas/core/indexes/accessors.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/series.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/90100451d4e00650bfdbf09c832c7f3f66d2626f/pandas/core/series.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/sparse/series.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/90100451d4e00650bfdbf09c832c7f3f66d2626f/pandas/core/sparse/series.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/arrays/sparse/test_array.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/90100451d4e00650bfdbf09c832c7f3f66d2626f/pandas/tests/arrays/sparse/test_array.py) !

> **Legend** - [Click here to learn more](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-delta)
> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/23183?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [0a2d501...e26d48e](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/23183?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

Latest commit should fix the doc rendering for Series.sparse.to_coo and Series.sparse.from_coo (we just need to use the regular `autosummary` directive, instead of the `autoaccessor`, since the docstring is on the accessor, not the object delegated to).

> For example, do we want to expose the IntIndex and BlockIndex officially as API?

I'm happy to remove those.

Forgot to remove sp_index and kind from the api.rst

This should be ready once it passes.
